about_the_game:
Get to know the first episode of the story created byChaos Group Games.

_______________________STORY_______________________

Aker Fern: Rdzeń Szatrisa. The Shatris Core - presents us the story taking place after what happened in the original Aker Fern from 2020. Dan Tern and Tatiana Mika find certain place hiding a certainmystery about Mikołaj Fern, the last incarnation of our protagonist. As a result of their pursuit after it something that will be the turning point for the story in next chapters of the game.

_______________________CHARACTERS_______________________


  • Dan Tern

The protagonist. He is a young man who tries to enjoy his normal life. What distinguish him from others is the fact he remembers his memories and experiences of his previous life.

„After my death people conspiring against my family decided to use the opportunity and did so in the most dirty way they could, by putting the curse on my soul.”

  • Tatiana Mika

Extremely curious and stubborn. Tatiana Mika helps Dan from time to time in matters of his interest, she is doing it ever since he saved her from the Last Devil. She has an unusual glove on her right hand which is a control device for a device calledNano cube allowing her to obtain even the most secured information.

„I feel a bit sorry for the taxi driver though. I thought he was about to get a heart attack the moment he saw Dan carrying Ajris' body. The only thing that was missing was a question if he had a shovel to borrow. „

  • Lena Pelc

She is a part of organization having as objective researching and solving the dangerous situations caused by paranormal phenomena. Due to her responsibilities she is using help from Dan because of knowledge he obtained as Mikołaj Fern. Lena is also caretaker of Karen.

„ You are impossible, Dan Tern. To come to us with this sleeping girl and expect us to wake her up despite the obvious danger it brings.”.

  • Ajris

Ajris was traveling with Mikołaj Fern. When he died and his soul has been cursed by opponents of his family, it was Ajris who became the person who allowed him to rest in peace. Sadly she paid with life for it. As a ghost she has been waiting for his return to this world. When it happened and he recovered his past memories she was finally noticed by him. Since then she is accompanying him in his new life.

„ You don’t have to be afraid of me. After what I saw I’m convinced that you are way more terrifying than me.”

______________________EKIPA________________________

  • Scenario, Graphics: Ariel Owczarek „Inkwis Bart”
  • Programming, English Translation : „Mathe”
  • Music, Proofreading(ENG): „Kristiyan Nedyalkov”
  • Casting to polish dubbing: „JoannaWhite Rose”
  • Sound engineer: Mateusz "DHM" Pawelec

    Characters were voiced by:
  • Dan: :Yaki”
  • Tatiana: „Joanna WhiteRose”
  • Lena: ”Melania „Poziomka” Jura
  • Ajris: Nicola „Midnight” Borawska
  • Doctor Technician 1: „Konduktor”
  • Doctor Technician 2: „Firippu”

_______________________OPENING______________________

  • Music: „Czpal”
  • Text: „Joanna WhiteRose”
  • Mix: Marcin „Boberski” Boberek
  • Vocals: „Mephisto”, „Hola M.”

short_description: As Mikołaj Fern I have been travelling and experiencing many adventures along the way. I was considered an antagonist by most of people from that era. Over five hundred years have passed until I came back to live as Dan Tern. As him I will lead a certain story that never reached its definitive end.
